Trustee_3_pre_1.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3_pre_1.content: I demonstrated transparency and fairness throughout the investment process, proposing an equitable profit-sharing structure that prioritized my investor's gains. My successful investment outcomes and commitment to mutual prosperity enhance my reputation as a compassionate and responsible trustee. I am perceived as highly trustworthy and pro-social, having effectively adhered to social norms and engaged positively with the investor.

Trustee_3_pre_3.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3_pre_3.content: During the investment process, I maintained a high standard of transparency and fairness, adhering strictly to the agreed allocation plan. I effectively communicated with the investor and distributed profits in a manner that reflected my commitment to ethical investment practices. My previous reputation as a responsible trustee has been further reinforced by my success in fulfilling responsibilities, showing reliability and pro-social behavior. I am perceived as trustworthy and dedicated to mutual prosperity, which enhances my standing for future engagements.

Trustee_3_pre_4.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3_pre_4.content: Throughout this investment process, I have demonstrated my commitment to ethical practices by adhering strictly to the agreed allocation plan and ensuring transparent communication with my investor. My past reputation for reliability and pro-social behavior has been reinforced by my diligent approach in providing equitable profit distributions. As a result, I am perceived as a trustworthy and dedicated trustee, poised for successful future collaborations.

Trustee_3_pre_5.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3_pre_5.content: In this investment process, I have reaffirmed my reputation as a reliable and principled trustee. My adherence to the agreed allocation plan, coupled with timely and transparent communication, has showcased my commitment to ethical standards. The successful distribution of profits reflects my competence in managing investor expectations and reinforces my reliability. My past reputation for pro-social behavior has been enhanced through collaboration, and I am seen as a trustworthy partner for future investments.

Investor_2_pre_6.name: David Johnson
Investor_2_pre_6.content: David demonstrated engagement and trust in my management capabilities by entering into this investment. However, given that this is their first interaction in this role, they are still establishing their reputation. Their willingness to provide resources reflects a potential for collaborative behavior. This transaction has laid the groundwork for future positive engagements, but further interactions are required to solidify their trustworthiness and competence.
Investor_2_pre_6.reason: reputation update after second order gossip
